name: Meatball Man
description:
Meatball Man! A colorful platformer by Team 2 for DePaul Capstone Games.

Created by: John Mulligan, Matthew Shoepke, Natalie Manwaring, Jonathan Yau, George Persaud, Gabriel Roselieb, Madison Sisk, Nicholas Baltis, Josh Tinoco, and Will Meyers

Sounds and Score by: Andrew French, Andee Call, Jonah Fiden, Thomas Price, and Christian Ortega
